author: plynch
msg: Recovery of changes made before the big plugin overhaul
o improved filters for goals that copy
o added ability for each webserver to have a clean target
o adding maven.webserver.root which says where to serve documents from
o add goals that start apache for Windows NT/XP/2000
o add a clean goal to cleanup installed services

author: kaz
msg: Changing the idiom used to "fix" the problems with the interaction
between the xml taglib and jelly context.  This just eliminates an extra
line of JSL, but it does make it slightly more readable.
